name: Slime's Revenge
description:
Slime's have always been the bottom of the gaming food chain. They are farmed by low level 'heroes' for XP until they level up and move on like nothing happened, all the while the slimes are defenceless. But that is about to change. Slime's revenge is a short but challenging 2D platformer where you, using the limited abilities a slime has, can traverse through trap-filled kingdoms and fight back against the 'heroes' who once disregarded the slimes. Fling yourself and stick to near any surface to get around and reach the end of each level.

  • 50 levels of increasing difficulty
  • 5 worlds, each introducing new gameplay mechanics
  • Optional slime coins in each level as an extra challenge for completionists
  • 10 unlockable hats
  • Non-traditional platforming gameplay allowing you to stick to and jump from any surface to reach your goal
  • Retro pixel art and cutscenes
  • A thrilling story of slimy revenge
  • 5 exciting boss levels against the members of the 'fearsome five'
  • A high-energy chiptune soundtrack
